data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 12 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Heroic Characters 12


This token pack contains 27 tokens. This pack contains more heroic characters.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Aasimar Paladin
  • Female Aasimar Rogue
  • Female Aasimar Warrior
  • Female Human Druid
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Knight
  • Female Human Monk
  • Female Human Nature Wizard
  • Female Human Ranger
  • Female Human Scout
  • Male Human Bandit
  • Male Human Battle Mage
  • Male Human Commander
  • Male Human Dark Knight
  • Male Human Dark Fighter
  • Male Human Druid
  • Male Human Fighter
  • Male Human Monk
  • Male Human Paladin Captain
  • Male Human Ranger
  • Male Human Rogue Mage
  • Male Human Scout
  • 2 Male Human Sorcerers
  • Male Human Stalker
  • Male Human Striker
  • Male Human Wolf Barbarian

Released on March 28, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
